body.name: LED End Table with Charging Station, Small Side Table for Living Room, Nightstand with USB Ports & Outlets, 3-Tier Bedside Table with Storage Shelf, Black
features: [Nightstand with RGB LED Lights] - You can freely switch between multiple color lights, adjust brightness levels, and choose from various flashing modes to suit your preferences. The soft lighting will accompany you into a peaceful dream, and the colored lights are designed to create a cozy or enchanting atmosphere in your bedroom. The bedside table makes for the perfect gift for you and your family.

[End Table with Charging Station] - The side table with USB ports and electrical outlets is exceptionally convenient, providing easy access to charge your phone, iPad, gaming console, and laptop. The end table includes 2 standard electrical outlets and 2 USB ports and comes with a 4.9-foot-long power cord, The end table with charging station allowing you to simultaneously charge multiple electronic devices.

[Multifunctional and Storage-Friendly Side Table] - Dimensions: 11 x 15 x 23.6 inches (DxWxH). This table serves as a versatile piece of furniture, acting as a charging side table next to your living room sofa, a bedside table with a lamp in your bedroom, and a temporary computer desk when you need to work.And also can be used as a sofa side table,small coffee table,reading table, display table.

[Sturdy, Stable, and Durable] - The end table is constructed from robust particle board and a sturdy steel frame, ensuring exceptional stability and a substantial weight-bearing capacity of up to 70 pounds. Moreover, The small side table provides some resistance to moisture and is simple to clean.

[Easy to Assemble] - The assembly process is simplified with a straightforward design, numbered parts, an installation manual, and the required tools. You can assemble the bedside table quickly within 30 minutes. If you encounter any problems, please don't hesitate to contact us for assistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Works for my son’s bedroom where he doesn’t sleep. Obviously not the most appealing but again, you get what you pay for. Everything works and it’s sturdy for a top heavy nightstand if that makes sense

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and very functional too !
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed at how nice this looks, and how sturdy it feels, definitely not flimsy like some self assembled furniture can be.This was something we really needed as we were recharging various things on a kitchen countertop.All the outlets, USB and regular plugs, work as expected.The light underneath the top shelf works well, it is not super bright but bright enough for it's purpose, it's not meant to be a floodlight, but it gives enough light to see what's on the shelf beneath.It was easy to assemble, just pay attention to the directions.I assembled it one day, then the next day I noticed the sticky pads used to hold wires in place underneath the top shelf did not hold, the room I have it in is not humid or hot so it's not due to that. They had 2 small plastic clamps (screwed in) for the LED strip itself so that was not affected, perhaps they should have used screwed in clamps for the wiring also instead of sticky pads (see included photos). Now I did not think that that by itself was enough to take off a star because the table is otherwise so very well made, maybe I would take off 1/4 star. I will have to check around and see if I have some extra wire clamps with small screws somewhere and redo those wires with that instead.Aside from that one very minor issue I mentioned I think this is an excellent table and glad we got it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, decent lighting
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than expected, but the quality was better than I thought it would be. The set-up was easy- lighting was a bit dim though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This end table was just what I was looking for. My son loves being able to change the colors on it. It is also great to have plug ins as well as charging ports for him to charge his iPhone. It is the perfect size for him to set his things on. It looks great too! It was easy to put together. It is sturdy and built to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's just ok. I bought this for my teenage son and within a day the adhesive cord-holder came off allowing the cords to fall. Not overly impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: First of all love the directions as they were all in pictures. Made it a breeze to put together. After assembly it feels very sturdy and secure. Enjoy the two outlets and the two USB A ports in the front to only take up one plug outlet on the wall. The lights are great for nightlight. Comes with remote for the lights. The center shelf can be mounted in one of two different positions allowing for more room on the bottom shelf of on the center shelf. Great little nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bedside table
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect bedside table. It has enough shelves to hold and charge all the phones/ipads/ watches. The instructions for assembly were fairly simple, it only took maybe 15 minutes or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The instructions were not detailed enough and it is small
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a nice end table if you have only a little space to put it in. However, we have a space twice it's size if we keep the floor lamp, or four times the space if we don't. The interesting thing about this end table is the LED lights. We are enjoying them, however, the instructions were not clear on how to install the LED lights. We used the wrong brackets and they fell down every day just like the cables. We fixed the LED lights with clear boxing tape, but the cables are too heavy to keep up. However, it is sturdy and it looks good. And I like the lights.
